Chris Wijnia / designer & developer

Hi, my name is Chris. I currently work for Boerdam - a digital agency based in The Netherlands. I design and code things. When I'm not working on something tech-related I like to spend my time traveling, playing chess or taking photos.

What I make

MVRDV
Online re-branding. Fully responsive mobile first redesign of the website using the latest front-end technologies.

mvrdv.com
Province of Overijssel
Changing democracy. With Boerdam we won the competition to make a democratic online participation platform for JIJ&Overijssel. In 2016 we won The Galjaard Award for our revolutionary concept.

jijenoverijssel.nl

What I do

Magic! Creating meaningful digital experiences.

Concept
Turning creative ideas into clear deliverable #goals with the focus on user engagement.
Design
Not just pretty. Intuitive, simple and amazing digital experiences. Sketching. Wireframing. Digital branding. Graphic, UX and UI design.
Development
Sass, Angular, ES2015, Typescript, HTML5, Web Components, Git, Gulp, Webpack, NodeJS. Top Notch tools for creating online products in the most efficient way.
Marketing
Specialized in digital marketing strategies. Utilising possibilities of social media and new technologies in an evolving digital landscape.
